text:
Luca-chan... Aren't you cold?
I have a scarf...
Luca-chan seems to be resistant to cold...

...Oh.
But Haruki-chan, weren't you from a cold place?

Then maybe Haruki-chan
is the one who's resistant to cold?

Cold things are cold~
If there's a kotatsu, I'd jump right into it without hesitation...

Yeah, I want one too...
...Hey, Luca-chan.
